name: Grapple Guy (Keegan77)
description:
Grapple Guy is a 2D platformer where... you can't jump. You can only move upwards by using your grappling hook!

Shoot at white blocks with your mouse button to slingshot up to it.

How fast can you beat each level? Post your lowest time in the comments!

Controls:
WASD

Click: Shoot Grapple
